author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Does @Nerdforge think they'll dive deeper into metallurgy? How many projects get scrapped because it wasn't "good enough?" In this final live-stream excerpt, Adam, Martina and Hansi answer these questions from lokiaka and LazyButWise, whom we thank for their questions! What projects have you scrapped for whatever reason?

@nerdforge: https://www.youtube.com/c/nerdforge
Adam Savage Meets Nerdforge's Martina and Hansi: https://youtu.be/iUgHy4yIQQw
Adam Savage Reacts to Nerdforge's Builds: https://youtu.be/tREqVPsCp4A
An Update on Martina's ⁨Prosthetic Pinky! https://youtu.be/LHUYbeFg3DQ
What Does @nerdforge Do With Their Huge Builds Post-Video? https://youtu.be/Alls8mGCaXs
How Much Does @Nerdforge Spend Per Build? https://youtu.be/NYO8MFklTxo
How Adam Is Hansi But Martina Is Jamie: https://youtu.be/cpFEXZb99RI
Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

Subscribe for more videos
title: The Fabrication Process Adam Savage Is Terrified to Do in His Shop (with @Nerdforge)
